com.ucsc.ooad.system

Class ParkingSystemApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucsc.ooad.system.ParkingSystemApp

  • public class ParkingSystemApp
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Pratibha This application simulates the working of a automated parking system. User parks the car in the slot alloted by the automated parking system. It generates a ticket with ticket number for the user. Also, driver uses this system and the ticket printed to pay the fee for the duration the car was parked in the slot. This application tracks the available slots and also informs the user if the parking lot is full.

    • Method Detail

      • park

        public Ticket park()
        This method checks for available parking slot and generates a ticket if slot is available
        Returns:
        Ticket object reference if there is a slot available or null if no slots available

      • checkAvailability

        public ParkingSlot checkAvailability()
        This method checks for available slots in the parking lot
        Returns:
        slot if available or null if no slots are available

      • captureEndTime

        public void captureEndTime()
        This method saves the end time

      • validateTicketNumber

        public boolean validateTicketNumber(int ticketNumEntered)
        This method validates the ticket number entered by the user when exiting the parking lot
        Parameters:
        ticketNumEntered - entered by the user when exiting from the parking lot
        Returns:
        true if valid slot number is entered else returns false

      • calculateTotalMinutes

        public void calculateTotalMinutes()
        This method calculates the total time (in minutes) the car was parked in the parking lot

      • getTotalFee

        public double getTotalFee()
        This method calculate the total fee due payment for the duration the car was parked in the parking lot
        Returns:
        total fee calculated

      • makeSlotAvailable

        public void makeSlotAvailable(int ticketNumber)
        This method sets the slot to available once the user choses to exit the parking lot
        Parameters:
        ticketNumber - slot number where the car was parked

      • setPaymentInformation

        public void setPaymentInformation(java.lang.String ccNumber,
                         java.lang.String cvvNumber,
                         java.lang.String expiry)
        This method creates a payment information object and sets all the credit card details.
        Parameters:
        ccNumber - users credit card number
        cvvNumber - ccv number of the credit card
        expiry - credit card expiry date

      • validateCreditCard

        public boolean validateCreditCard()
        This method sends the payment information to the bank class
        Returns:
        true if validation is successful else false (For demo - Assumption is made that the validation is successful always.)
